mapper.insert: insert into daily_stop (daily_stop_id, daily_train_id, stop_index, station_name, arrival_time, departure_time) values (#{dailyStopId}, #{dailyTrainId}, #{stopIndex}, #{stationName}, #{arrivalTime}, #{departureTime})
mapper.select: select t1.daily_train_id as daily_train_id, t1.daily_stop_id as start_daily_stop_id, t1.departure_time as start_time, t1.station_name as start_station, t1.stop_index as start_stop_index, t2.daily_stop_id as end_daily_stop_id, t2.arrival_time as end_time, t2.station_name as end_station, t2.stop_index as end_stop_index from (select * from daily_stop where station_name = #{startStation} and DATE(departure_time) = #{startDate}) as t1 left join (select * from daily_stop where station_name = #{endStation} and arrival_time > #{startDate}) as t2 on t1.daily_train_id = t2.daily_train_id where t1.stop_index < t2.stop_index
